compounddef.title: POLY Convert Roots To Polynomial Coefficients

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: This function calculates the polynomial coefficients for given roots p = poly(r) when r is a vector, is a vector whose elements are the coefficients of the polynomial whose roots are the elements of r. Alternately, you can provide a matrix p = poly(A) when A is an N x N square matrix, is a row vector with N+1 elements which are the coefficients of the characteristic polynomial, det(lambda*eye(size(A))-A).
Contributed by Paulo Xavier Candeias under GPL.
